data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Zhuzhou that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhuzhou, Hunan, China

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Zhuzhou who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Zhuzhou, Hunan, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Zhuzhou words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hmu, Southern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hmu, Southern people.
Lord, please give the 303,444 believers in the county of Zhuzhou the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Zhuzhou to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Zhuzhou to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
